PartyCreditProfile.name: PartyCreditProfile
PartyCreditProfile.description: Represents the credit score details for a party.

CreditBureauName.description: The name of the credit bureau providing the credit profile information.

CreditPrflReportIdentifier.description: The identifier of the credit profile report from the credit bureau for a party profile.

CreditScore.description: The credit score of the party profile.

CreditScoreDate.description: The date when the credit score of the party profile was accessed.

IsVerified.description: Indicates whether the party credit profile is verified (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the party credit profile record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the record owner.

PartyProfileId.description: The party profile that's associated with the risk assessment.

TotalExposureAmount.description: The total amount of outstanding loans of applicant, from all banks.
